settings.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

settings.label: Meta Description Homepage
settings.default: December Shopify Template with multiple layouts and styles allows you to create different structures and satisfies any specific requirements for different kinds of business.
settings.info: A meta description is an element in the HTML code of a web page that provides a brief description of the content of that page.

settings.info: Button Background Hover, Link Hover, Button Outline Hover

settings.info: If disable Font 2 body, Font body is Custom Font Main

settings.label: Image
settings.info: Shown when sharing a link on social media. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) about image thumbnails.

settings.label: Wishlist page
settings.info: [Create new page](/admin/pages/new) and select template suffix is page.wishlist

settings.label: Number of days for which the product is considered 'new'
Products
settings.info: Add a product reference (list of products)

settings.label: Enable Coupon Code
settings.info: Coupon Code will auto add in Checkout Page

settings.label: Minimum order value to be free shipping

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the  spelling to use here, refer to the first checkout page.

Do not forget to include the snippet shipping-calculator in your cart.liquid template where you want the shipping calculator to appear. You can get the snippet here: [shipping-calculator.liquid](https://github.com/carolineschnapp/shipping-calculator/blob/master/shipping-calculator.liquid) .
Display product images overlaid on mockup templates. Only the first product image will be composited.

settings.label: Enable mockup compositing
settings.info: Composite product images onto mockup templates

settings.label: Mockup files base URL
settings.info: Base URL where mockup files are stored (e.g., https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/YOUR_SHOP_ID/files). Mockup files should be named mockup-{type}.png

settings.content: Configure where product images are placed on each mockup type. Format: {"mockupType": {"x": 150, "y": 200, "width": 300, "height": 300}}

settings.label: Mockup position configuration (JSON)
settings.info: x, y = top-left corner position | width, height = product image size on mockup

settings.content:
1. Upload mockup templates to Shopify Files (Content ‚Üí Files) with names like 'mockup-tshirt.png'
2. Copy the base URL path and paste above
3. Set product metafield 'custom.mockup_type' to match the mockup name (e.g., 'tshirt')
4. First product image will automatically composite onto the mockup
